title: blind in champion select

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Hi, so just now i was searching a ranked flex game and when i got in champ select i couldn't see anything, i couldn't see the champions or my spells, not even the teams and who had to ban, i tried 'locating' the button to lock in my champ but it didn't work and i ' left during champ select' because i wasn't able to choose/ban champions, i lost 3LP, so no big deal, but then it happened again, couldn't see anything again, it put me out of champ select and then i lost 10LP. I do not think this is normal, is there a solution to this?

replies.body:
Is this only happening in the updated client?  What happens if you try a custom game in the legacy:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if it works okay on there to help rule out a possibility with the client or something else like connection.
Too bad clicking "launch legacy client" does absolutely nothing.
